str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
A primary particle; properly, indicative of affirmation or concession; usually followed by a contrasted clause with de.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To begin, am, exist, be in possession. From hupo and archomai; to begin under, i.e. Come into existence; expletively, to exist (verb).
Diligent, earnest, zealous, eager. From spoude; prompt, energetic, earnest.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Of one's own accord, self-chosen. From autos and the same as hairetizo; self-chosen, i.e. voluntary.
